description:
Sorry to anyone hoping to catch Steven R. McQueen's eye: He does have a girlfriend.那些想引起Steven. R. McQueen注意的姑娘们，你们要失望了：他已经有女朋友了。

Over the years, it’s become apparent that Steven has a weakness for blonds. He dated former Disney darling Chelsea Kane off-and-on for over a year, and then the Vampire Diaries stud moved on to co-star Candice Accola (Caroline). They were spotted making out at a club in Catalina, California in July 2010.从他这些年的感情经历看来，他对金发美女似乎难以抗拒。他之前曾经和Disney的Chelsea Kane交往过一年，之后又爱上了同在《吸血鬼日记》中出演的女演员Canice Accola。他们在2010年7月的时候曾经被拍到在加利福尼亚的卡特琳娜岛上的一家俱乐部里被拍到在一起。

Since then, Steven appears to have gotten friendly with Hillary Harley, a Vampire Diaries production assistant. Not only did he bring the beautiful blond to the premiere of Thor on May 2, 2011, they’ve posted a lot of evidence of their romance on Twitter since then.之后，Steven又和《吸血鬼日记》制片助理Hillary Harley关系密切。他不仅带这位姑娘出席了2-11年5月2号《雷神》的首映，还在Twitter上发了很多亲密照片。

After Thanksgiving 2011, he tweeted a photo of himself with his arm around her, showing the two with whipped cream on their faces.” And if that weren’t cute enough, she’s also shared an image from one of their Draw Something games. If that’s not love, then we don’t know what is.在2011年的感恩节过后，Steven还发了一张自己搂着Hillary的照片，照片上两个人脸上都抹了奶油。如果这还不够的话，Hilary还分享过一张他们你画我猜的图片。如果这都不是在一起了，那还能是什么。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》Jeremy有女朋友了！
